Name: removeHyphenSpaces
Comment: Remove hyphen (untranslated article) surrounded by spaces

Name: removeHyphenSpace
Comment: Remove hyphen (untranslated article) followed by space

Name: removeSpaceHyphen
Comment: Remove hyphen (untranslated article) preceded by space

Name: removeInsertStart
Comment: Remove indicator of start of inserted words

Name: removeInsertEnd
Comment: Remove indicator of end of inserted words

Name: reduceDoubleUnderlines
Comment: Reduce double underlines in entire file

Name: reduceDoubleSpaces
Comment: Reduce double spaces in entire file

Name: joinUnderlineAfterNot
Comment: Join a floating underline to the correct word
